51 
71 template<class T>
72 class DeallocBoostSharedPtr
73 {
74 public:
76  DeallocBoostSharedPtr( const boost::shared_ptr<T> &sptr ) : sptr_(sptr) {}
78  typedef T ptr_t;
80  void free( T* ptr_in ) const { sptr_.reset(); }
82  const boost::shared_ptr<T>& ptr() const { return sptr_; }
83 private:
84  mutable boost::shared_ptr<T> sptr_;
85  DeallocBoostSharedPtr(); // Not defined and not to be called!
86 };
87 
88 
94 template<class T>
95 class RCPDeleter
96 {
97 public:
99  RCPDeleter( const RCP<T> &rcp ) : rcp_(rcp) {}
101  typedef void result_type;
103  typedef T * argument_type;
105  void operator()(T * x) const { rcp_ = null; }
107  const RCP<T>& ptr() const { return rcp_; }
108 private:
109  mutable RCP<T> rcp_;
110  RCPDeleter(); // Not defined and not to be called!
111 };

153 template<class T> inline
154 bool is_null( const boost::shared_ptr<T> &p )
155 {
156  return p.get() == 0;
157 }
158 
159 
164 template<class T> inline
165 bool nonnull( const boost::shared_ptr<T> &p )
166 {
167  return p.get() != 0;
168 }
169

171 } // namespace boost

Teuchos
The Teuchos namespace contains all of the classes, structs and enums used by Teuchos, as well as a number of utility routines.
